metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28484 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In libxml2 before 2.10.4, parsing of certain invalid XSD schemas can leadto a NULL pointer dereference and subsequently a segfault. This occurs inxmlSchemaFixupComplexType in xmlschemas.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.9
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.9
python-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.9
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.9').
